## Source: ossf-package-analysis (334ea071d3d2127435d95bdf47129449b33f6c542fe9c91d19d4c5365f86d77f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ninjainjtest1337' @ 0.1.5 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
